  • Constructor Details

    • CommonBoard

      public CommonBoard()
      First constructor for common board. It gets nothing in input, and it creates new empty decks and empty plates

    • CommonBoard

      public CommonBoard(List<Deck<? extends Card>> decks)
      Second constructor for common board. It gets a list of four decks ((1st) resource, (2nd) gold, (3rd) starting, (4th) aim) and creates empty plates
      Parameters:
      decks -

    • CommonBoard

      public CommonBoard(Deck<ResourceCard> resDeck, Deck<GoldResourceCard> goldResDeck, Deck<StartingCard> startDeck, Deck<AimCard> aimDeck)
      Third constructor for common board. It gets the four decks in input and creates empty decks Requirements: decks passed as argument cannot be null
      Parameters:
      resDeck - Deck of resource cards
      goldResDeck - Deck of golden resource cards
      startDeck - Deck of starting cards
      aimDeck - Deck of aim cards

    • iniCommonBoard

      public void iniCommonBoard()
      Initialization of the CommonBoard by loading the decks, shuffle them and adding the cards on the plates Requirements: decks and plates should be already created

    • deckEmptinessCheck

      public boolean deckEmptinessCheck()
      This method checks if both the resource deck and the golden deck are both empty
      Returns:
      true, if they are. False, otherwise

    • pickFromResourcePlate

      public ResourceCard pickFromResourcePlate(int selection)
      This method get the card from the ResourcePlate Requirements: selection can only have the values 0,1 and ResourcePlate cannot be empty
      Parameters:
      selection - is the index that select which of the two cards pick from the plate
      Returns:
      the card selected, null if there is no card at the index selected

    • pickFromGoldenPlate

      public GoldResourceCard pickFromGoldenPlate(int selection)
      This method get the card from the GoldenPlate Requirements: selection can only have the values 0,1 and GoldenPlate cannot be empty
      Parameters:
      selection - is the index that select which of the two cards pick from the plate
      Returns:
      the card selected, null if there is no card at the index selected

    • addCardToResourcePlate

      public void addCardToResourcePlate(int selection)
      This method replace the card drawn from the plate with the first card of the resource deck If the deck is empty it set null at the position to be replaced Requirements: selection can only have the values 0,1
      Parameters:
      selection - is the index of the card drawn from the plate

    • addCardToGoldenPlate

      public void addCardToGoldenPlate(int selection)
      This method replace the card drawn from the plate with the first card of the golden deck If the deck is empty it set null at the position to be replaced Requirements: selection can only have the values 0,1
      Parameters:
      selection - is the index of the card drawn

    • boardCardDifference

      public int boardCardDifference(int choice, int selection)
      This method returns the cardID of the new Card that took position of the Card picked by the Player. In case of an empty Plate position or Deck, this method will return a particular int (404), inspired by the HTTP error 404 not found (it isn't linked directly to the HTTP protocol but the value is used due to its common popularity)
      Parameters:
      choice - choice of which type of Card to draw from the CommonBoard: resource(0) or golden(1)
      selection - possible selection on the CommonBoard: the two cards on plate(0), plate(1); or deck(2)
      Returns:
      the cardID of the new Card on the Plate

    • deckDifference

      public int deckDifference(int choice)
      This method returns the cardID of the Card in the Top of the Deck (it has to be used after a draw()). In case of an empty Deck, this method will return a particular int (404), inspired by the HTTP error 404 not found (it isn't linked directly to the HTTP protocol but the value is used due to its common popularity)
      Parameters:
      choice - choice of which type of Card to draw from the CommonBoard: resource(0) or golden(1)
      Returns:
      the cardID of the Card on the top of the chosen deck
